channel.title: RS Memory - The days we loved. [Hyperion] (Continued)
channel.description:
[img]http://images.cooltext.com/2495445.png[/img]
I have re-continued the project because I have a lot more time to work, this project will be finished. :)
Before continuing through the thread I would like to remind you that this is [u]NOT[/u] a Runescape remake.
The server is currently getting ready to Go through Beta. I will open Beta once I feel the server has enough content to be enjoyable. In a reply tell me if you want to take part in Beta.
I will not be working on this that often, I just don't have time for it right now.
Latest Content. Started mining base. [img]http://i.imgur.com/1y8Z3.png[/img] Added lots of shops worldwide to help the economy. Improved Combat, the Combat before was VERY poor. Basic Crafting added.
[code]Content List. -Range clipping -Full server sided clipping -Range gfx -Blocking -NPC's randomly walk -Added 474 Gameframe -Following is clipped -Ladder system -Very easy quest system -Basic Runecrafting added. -Warriors Guild - Not finished -Special attack on most weapons. -Perfect item switches -Woodcutting skill added and nearly complete. -Flax picking -Energy draining -Better combat. -Perfect prayer drain rates -Amulet teleports -Runescape login interface -Bank deposit -Thieving base added -Lot's of other small things[/code]
[code]Skills started. Agility,Cooking,Firemaking,Fishing,Fletching,Herblore,Mining,Prayer,Runecrafting,Thieving,Woodcutting. [/code]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1y8Z3.png[/img]
[ul][li]Correct Mining timers[/li] [li]Correct Pickaxe Requirements[/li] [li]All ores can be mined[/li] [li]Prospecting[/li] [li]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li] [li]Scans for the best pick axe in the inventory & Pickaxes can be used in inventory[/li] [li]More soon..[/li][/ul]
[code]-Beta testers- None[/code]
Much more media coming soon, when i'm not busy i'll finish the pictures.
[img]http://img848.imageshack.us/img848/3408/rsm3.png[/img] [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/1661/rsm5.png[/img] [img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/9652/rsm4.png[/img]
[font=georgia][u]Credits Graham[/u][/font]

item.title: RS Memory - The days we loved. [Hyperion] (Continued)
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:2, topic:438550”]Does your client have a gameframe change option?
Cause if it doesn’t those are two different clients.[/quote]
Yes you can change your game frame.

Read full topic

If it doesn’t I’d pick the 377 gameframe.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

I have re-continued the project because I have a lot more time to work, this project will be finished.

Before continuing through the thread I would like to remind you that this is NOT a Runescape remake.

The server is currently getting ready to Go through Beta. I will open Beta once I feel the server has enough content to be enjoyable.
In a reply tell me if you want to take part in Beta.

I will not be working on this that often, I just don’t have time for it right now.

Latest Content.
Started mining base.
Added lots of shops worldwide to help the economy.
Improved Combat, the Combat before was VERY poor.
Basic Crafting added.

Content List. -Range clipping -Full server sided clipping -Range gfx -Blocking -NPC's randomly walk -Added 474 Gameframe -Following is clipped -Ladder system -Very easy quest system -Basic Runecrafting added. -Warriors Guild - Not finished -Special attack on most weapons. -Perfect item switches -Woodcutting skill added and nearly complete. -Flax picking -Energy draining -Better combat. -Perfect prayer drain rates -Amulet teleports -Runescape login interface -Bank deposit -Thieving base added -Lot's of other small things

Skills started. Agility,Cooking,Firemaking,Fishing,Fletching,Herblore,Mining,Prayer,Runecrafting,Thieving,Woodcutting.

[ul][li]Correct Mining timers[/li]
[li]Correct Pickaxe Requirements[/li]
[li]All ores can be mined[/li]
[li]Prospecting[/li]
[li]Random chance of obtaining gems[/li]
[li]Scans for the best pick axe in the inventory & Pickaxes can be used in inventory[/li]
[li]More soon…[/li][/ul]

-Beta testers- None

Much more media coming soon, when i’m not busy i’ll finish the pictures.
